Swati Tomar

PGT Mathematics | Experienced Math Tutor

Helping Students Master Mathematics with Confidence and Enthusiasm

Is your child struggling with mathematics? Do complex equations and calculus concepts seem overwhelming? I can help transform their learning experience!

With an M.Sc in Mathematics and 5+ years of teaching experience, I specialize in making difficult math concepts clear, engaging, and accessible for students of all abilities. As the recipient of the Best Debut Teacher Award at New Horizon Gurukul, I bring proven methods that help students not just pass exams, but develop a genuine understanding and appreciation for mathematics.

Currently accepting new students for one-on-one and small group tuitions in Bengaluru.

My Teaching Journey

Over the past 5+ years, I've had the privilege of guiding hundreds of students through their mathematics journey across several prestigious institutions in India.

My diverse experience teaching at New Horizon Gurukul , Delhi Public School and Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya has equipped me with the skills to address various learning challenges and help your child excel in mathematics.

How My Experience Benefits Your Child

  • Award-Winning Methods: As a recipient of the Best Debut Teacher Award at New Horizon Gurukul , I've developed effective techniques that make complex concepts accessible to all learning styles.
  • Specialized Approach: Developed unique methods for teaching challenging calculus and algebra concepts that help students solve problems independently.
  • Exam Strategies: As a CBSE Class 12 Evaluator and former Exam Incharge for Grades 11-12 , I provide students with proven test-taking strategies, knowledge of evaluation patterns, and techniques to manage exam stress - helping them maximize their scores.
  • Holistic Support: Beyond just teaching math, I provide guidance on study techniques, exam preparation, and building confidence that serves students throughout their academic journey.

How I Transform Math Learning

From Frustration to "Aha!" Moments

When your child says "I just don't get it," that's where my work begins. I identify exactly where understanding breaks down, then rebuild that foundation using techniques that match their learning style. Parents often tell me, "We've never seen math explained this way before!"

Building Math Confidence

Math anxiety is real and affects performance. I create a safe space where mistakes are welcomed as learning opportunities. We celebrate small victories, building resilience and confidence with each problem solved.

Beyond Formulas: Real Understanding

I never teach memorization. Instead, I help students truly understand why mathematical concepts work, connecting them to real-world examples they can relate to. This deeper understanding stays with them beyond exams.

Personalized Learning Path

No two students learn alike. I begin with a thorough assessment of your child's strengths, challenges, and learning style. Then I create a customized plan that adapts as they progress, ensuring steady improvement at their optimal pace.

Student Success Stories
